skillTree.localised_description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs are stubborn, but none more so than Grudgebearer, the founder of the Age of Reckoning.

skillTree.localised_description: Kragg rarely emerges from the Underhalls of Karaz-a-Karak, preferring instead to labour secretly on his lore, which he jealously guards.

items.colour_text: Kragg forged his hammer when he was still a young Runesmith, it bears Kragg's own hidden and secret rune. It heats up the hammer till it glows red hot and then transfers the heat to whatever it hits. It also drives the hammer forward with crushing force. The hammer is so hot that any enemies affected by fire are affected by the hammer as if it were actually burning.

effects.description: Ability: "Kragg's Hammer"
Income from post-battle loot: +10%
Melee attack: +10
Enables magical attacks
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +50

items.colour_text: Kragg's armour is forged from heavy gromril. Over the years the Runelord has laboured long and hard on it, turning each separate component into a lovingly crafted work of art.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Kragg's Armour"

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
